name: gmail
title: Gmail
description: Read Gmail messages via IMAP. Supports multiple accounts.
setup_instructions: To connect Gmail, you need an App Password (not your regular password). This requires 2-Step Verification enabled on your Google account.

item_fields.name: app_password
item_fields.label: App Password
item_fields.help:
1. Go to the link below
2. Click 'Select app' > Mail
3. Click 'Select device' > Other > type 'Claude'
4. Click 'Generate'
5. Copy the 16-character password (no spaces)
